ygData.subject: Re: Trading Advice
ygData.msgSnippet: Haven t lost out on the chance yet :-) ... From:  To:  Sent: Tuesday, January 04, 2000 10:12 AM Subject: Re:
ygData.messageBody:
Haven't lost out on the chance yet :-)

----- Original Message -----
From: <John_Senior@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, January 04, 2000 10:12 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Trading Advice


> From: John_Senior@...
>
> Jesus Christ man, you FOOL.
>
> Mithril trades for stuff like FBSS, manastone etc. Noooooooo, can't
believe
> you lost out on that chance.
> All the level 50 bards I know wear Mithril if they don't have Imbrued.
>
> Damn, wish I had offers like that. =(
>
> Madagan, Bard of 32 songs - Veeshan
>
>
>
>
>
> "Jeff Illian" <jeff@...> on 04/01/2000 16:10:02
>
> Please respond to eqbards@onelist.com
>
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> cc: (bcc: John Senior/M&G)
> Subject: [eqbards] Trading Advice
>
>
>
>
> From: "Jeff Illian" <jeff@...>
>
> Last night a high level wizard starting offering me a ton of mithril stuff
> in trade for my lambent. Having never seen a piece of mithril before in
my
> life, I haven't the slightest whether or not this is a good trade or not.
> Anyone got any advice on the break down between mithril and lambent? He
> was
> offering multiple mithril pieces per one lambent piece.
>
> Taneran Dreamweaver
> <Clan Jax>
> Bard of the 35th song
> Prexu
>
> Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
> with the subject submissions.
>
>
